title: Brush Teeth
instructions: Brush your teeth for 2 minutes with fluoride toothpaste. Don't forget to brush your tongue too!

title: Read for 20 minutes
instructions: Choose a book you enjoy and read quietly for 20 minutes. Try to imagine the story in your head!

title: Tidy Room
instructions: Put toys in their proper places, make your bed, and put dirty clothes in the hamper.

title: Practice Writing
instructions: Practice writing letters or words neatly. Take your time and focus on making them look nice!

title: Help Set Table
instructions: Put plates, cups, and utensils on the table for everyone. Make sure everything is in the right place!

title: Draw or Color
instructions: Use your imagination to create something beautiful! You can draw, color, or make crafts.

title: Outdoor Play
instructions: Go outside and play! You can run, jump, ride your bike, or play with friends.

title: Prepare for Bed
instructions: Put on pajamas, brush teeth, and get ready for a good night's sleep!
